Chain-of-thought Prompting.explaination: In this method, we use the idea of natural language rational means a series of intermediate reasoning steps, as demonstrations  with few-shot learning to generate a prompt which will make GPT3 learn to decompose questions.

Least-to-most Prompting.explaination: This prompting method works in two phases, first it divides complex questions into a set of simpler sub-questions and in phase two it solves these subproblems sequentially reaching the final answer. It has an inherent structure which suits our task of decomposing a question to answer it.

Hybrid-way.explaination: We allow GPT3 to first formulate chain-of-thought reasoning and ask GPT3 to use this reasoning to formulate decompositions. It allows GPT3 to generate accurate decompositions for SVMP tasks.
